channel.title: Int reverse on Eunhan's library
channel.description: Recent content in Int reverse on Eunhan's library

item.title: [JAVA code]int reverse
item.description: int reverse without using string Time complexity : $O(n)$ Space complexity : $O(1)$ public static int reverseInt(int input) { int output = 0; int length = ((int) (Math.log10(input)) + 1); for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) { output = output * 10 + input % 10; input = input / 10; } return output; }
